description: Pear, walnut and naturally sweet cinnamon make this autumnal crumble delicious and warming, with a touch of ginger.
name: Pear, Walnut & Cinnamon Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 large pears, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170°C/150°C fan-forced and lightly grease 4 ramekins with a little butter.
Place the pears, lemon juice and zest, a tablespoon of honey and the cinnamon in a bowl and mix well. Divide the mixture between the ramekins and bake for 10 minutes.
Add half the oats to a food processor and blitz to a flour consistency. Add the flour, oats and walnuts to a small bowl. Pour over the butter and remaining honey and mix well.
Divide the crumble topping between the ramekins and bake for 25 more minutes, until golden and bubbling. Serve warm.
